txt.en: Defend Lúfa against the White Hand's hirelings.
Defend Lúfa against the White Hand's hirelings
Check the corpse of the brigand leader for evidence
Talk to Lúfa in Ordlac's house
'Aye, I am unharmed...is that all of them? Are there any hiding in the shadows?'
The windows and door are securely locked
You have found a dagger, covered with a slimy black substance
Defended Lúfa against the White Hand's hirelings
Lúfa has retired for the evening, leaving you to stand guard against the anticipated attempt upon her life.
Lúfa is at Ordlac's house in Oserley.\n\nSpeak with Lúfa and make sure that she is unharmed.
'You...you saved my life! How may I repay you?'
'What happened? Did the brigands indeed try to kill me?'
Check the windows and doors to make sure they are secured.
Check the corpse of the brigand leader for evidence.
